meanings.definition: A phone call made using an automated dialing system.
meanings.sent1: I received a robocall about a survey yesterday.
meanings.sent2: The robocall informed me about a new offer.
meanings.sent3: The robocall from the telemarketer interrupted my dinner.
meanings.sent4: The constant robocalls felt like a never-ending stream of interruptions.
meanings.sent5: The loud robocall echoed through the empty house.

meanings.definition: To make a phone call using an automated dialing system.
meanings.sent1: They robocalled their entire contact list to spread the message.
meanings.sent2: I will robocall you later with the details.
meanings.sent3: He decided to robocall his friend as a prank.
meanings.sent4: She robocalled the emergency hotline for help.
meanings.sent5: The company robocalls customers for feedback on their services.
